text:
I could not find it in the docs, but maybe I am missing something. Is there an easy way to perform nuisance regression using nilearn (4D volume to 4D volume)?

If yes this person would like to know: https://neurostars.org/t/confounds-from-fmriprep-which-one-would-you-use-for-glm/326/9
title: Nuisance regression in nilearn
